subject: clarification of included parts
description_text:
Hello,
I wanted to confirm whether a set of 3 VAM Pro Linear Motors are included
with the
Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback


and if so does it include the brackets and power supply?

I see them shown in the pics on the product page but isn't clear in the
text of the page.

Best regards
Jamey

conversations.body_text: Hi Jamey. cates,  You can purchase the product in this link, and all the things you mentioned are included.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-x-ultra-pedal-with-haptics
